K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173a-1: gra ha m'a tri ka n'a ma dha ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173a-2: bod skad du; gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173a-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173a-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173a-5: bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer na lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173a-24: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs te mang po rnams kyis bstod cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173a-25: rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa'i seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-0: byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang thabs cig @173b ste; 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po rdo rje gtum po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sde dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gzhu can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i spyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:173b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174a-1: dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis bskor cing mdun du bltas pa la chos ston te; bkod pa chen po rgyan gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174a-8: yongs su byang ba'i chos ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174a-9: de nas phyag na rdo rje 'khor de dag la bltas te langs nas bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste snyems pa dang bcas pa'i skyil mo krung legs par bcas nas 'khor de dag la 'gying bag tu bltas te rdo rje thal mo rang gi snying gar bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174a-11: gza' mi bzad pa'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174a-12: drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174a-13: khro ba'i gzugs can dag sems can rnams la 'tshe bar bgyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-1: sems can tshe ring po rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-2: tshe thung bar bgyid pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-3: de ltar sems can thams cad la gnod pas 'tshe bar bgyid pa de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can thams cad srung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; gang yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-5: bde ba'i phyir gsang chen pas kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-7: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-8: gza' mi bzad pa'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-9: shin tu khro ba shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyi mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-11: bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-12: de dag mchod pas mchod 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-13: gnod par byed pa gnod byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-14: gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-15: ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-16: lha rnams dang ni lha min dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-18: gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-19: mi rnams dang ni srul po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:174b-20: drag po gzi brjid chen po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175a-2: gsang sngags dang ni mchod pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175a-3: rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175a-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye ste gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175a-5: de nas de'i mod de la nyi ma la sogs pa gza' thams cad langs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par byas te phyag 'tshal nas pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag rnams la sogs pas chos smra ba rnams srung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-0: sa bcing pa rnams bgyid par 'gyur @175b ba bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-4: aom sh'i t'am sha be sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-5: aom rakt'am ga ku m'a r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-7: aom bho g'a sba d'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-8: aom aa su rotta m'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-10: aom aa mri ta pra y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-11: aom dzyo te shke be sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-14: gza' dgu'i gsang sngags kyi snying po bklags pas 'grub pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-15: kha dog dang mthun pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-19: dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-20: re re la yang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-22: de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig lan bdun brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-24: gza' thams cad srung ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-25: dbul ba'i gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:175b-26: tshe zad pa las tshe ring bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176a-2: gzhan yang sems can gyi rigs gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176a-3: gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176a-5: gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod pa byas te nyin gcig bzhin du krog par byed pa'i chos smra ba gang yin pa de la gza' thams cad bdag nyid kun gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176a-6: de dang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbul ba yang sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176a-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas gza' thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176a-11: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176a-12: rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176a-13: gza'i khyim bcu gnyis rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-4: kash'a pa ya ksh'a pa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-9: bdag nyid myur du bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-11: sgyu 'phrul chen po rnams 'dul du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-12: bdag gi sdig pa rnams par skam du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-19: p'u ra ya p'u ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-20: ma ma sarba satvan'anytsa ma no ra thi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-22: aa dhishthi ta sa ma ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-24: brum: sv'ah'a; hr'i: sv'ah'a: dhu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-29: dh'a ra n'i su t'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-31: bri ha spa t'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-41: dv'a da sha r'a sh'i n'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-42: sarba au pa dra p'a ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:176b-43: aom sarba bi dhye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:177a-0: gza' rnams kyis yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla tha chung gi yar ngo tshes bdun nas brtsams te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod pa byas te @177a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:177a-2: de nas zla ba nya ba'i nyin mtshan thog thag bklags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:177a-3: de la lo dgu'i bar du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:177a-7: rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:177a-9: gza' thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:177a-10: gza' thams cad kyis ci 'dod pa sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:177a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:177a-12: zhes gsol nas mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-021:177a-13: gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
